Package com.fromlabs.inventory.inventoryservice.common.exception.handler

Class RequestExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fromlabs.inventory.inventoryservice.common.exception.handler.RequestExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExceptionHandler<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>>
    public class RequestExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExceptionHandler<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>>
    Exception Handler are created to solve the issue which define a united way to handle all type of exception while developer handle the process business logic

    The simple ideas are that developer can define the strategy for solving each type of exception just only once and the rest will follow the predefined rules

    In this special case, the exception handler is mainly user for solve simple case of predefined Exception in Services and Controllers

    See Also:
    ExceptionHandler, ResponseEntity
